coin-info.ae-mainnet_text: Your tokens will become transferable after the Ã¦ternity mainnet has launched

same-phase.heading: {{currentPhase}} Migration Successful
same-phase.text: Your balance of {{migratedTokens}} will become available with the next hardfork at the end of {{phaseEnd}}

aeternity.no-transactions_text: There are no transactions yet for this account.

tx-list-disabled.text: Currently unable to display the transaction history. Please refer to the Blockexplorer.

highest.label: Highest Security
highest.text: With the AirGap two device approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.

medium.label: Medium Security
medium.text: With the AirGap two app approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.

vault.heading: AirGap Vault
vault.text: The private key is generated and securely stored on another device with the AirGap Vault app. You have to install AirGap Vault to use AirGap Wallet

wallet.heading: AirGap Wallet
wallet.text: This is the AirGap Wallet application, that deals with only public information and is responsible for broadcasting transactions to the blockchain.

introduction-download.title: Install AirGap Vault
introduction-download.heading: Let's install AirGap Vault!
introduction-download.text: There are a few ways to install AirGap Vault, choose the one that fits the best for you.
introduction-download.play-store_text: Install AirGap Vault directly from the Google Play Store for this or a dedicated device.
introduction-download.app-store_text: Install AirGap Vault directly from the App Store for this or a dedicated device.
introduction-download.install-distro_text: Install AirGap Vault Distribution on a dedicated computer for signing transactions air gapped.

portfolio.empty-state_text: To use the AirGap Wallet app you need to Sync with AirGap Vault. Select the account in AirGap Vault and display the sync QR code. Scan this code with AirGap Wallet.

scan.title: Scan QR
scan.text: Scan a sync QR to add an account or scan a transaction QR to confirm and send it.
scan.empty-state_heading: In order to scan QR codes, AirGap Wallet needs the camera permission.

scan-address.title: Scan Account Address
scan-address.text: Scan the QR code of an account address.

scan-sync.title: Sync Account Data
scan-sync.text: Open AirGap Vault, select an account and then Sync, scan the Sync QR code with AirGap Wallet.
scan-sync.description: No private keys or any non-public data will be shared during this process.

transaction-qr.text: Open AirGap Vault and scan this transaction in order to sign it.

wallet-import.title: Confirm Import
wallet-import.text: Would you like to import the following account?
wallet-import.warning: You have already added this account in AirGap.
